Articles.Content:
I would if I could, sir, but I never finished constructing a holomatrix. I'm am stuck in the computer.

Come on you aching back! It's just pain! This is... The la- \*pant\* Last bit... Of the drive upgrades! **Drops**

Finally! Good god I was about to go crazy. That felt like 4km rather than 11m.

O-\*pant\* Okay... I've got the dri-\*pant\* Drive system in place. 10 more seconds and it should be functional.

[i hope you've prepared for your first experience at Helix velocity]
(Is it anything like powering through mass relays?)
[No. Trust me, it's much worse more difficult better. Yeah, let's go with that]
Xannari, hang on to something! Vincent give me control and shut off the inertial dampeners! Get ready for a little jolt! \*turns the ship sharply toward the coordinates of laythe's last position)

WhoawhoaWHOADUDE! **Slams into wall**

Errg... Maybe next time I can get more than a .3 second warning? Please and thank you...

Well, I didn't tell you what it was, but I installed a Gigahelix drive. Probably a bit more of a \*modification\* than you thought, but it works...

It works, right?

> 
> WhoawhoaWHOADUDE! **Slams into wall**
> Errg... Maybe next time I can get more than a .3 second warning? Please and thank you...
> 
> Well, I didn't tell you what it was, but I installed a Gigahelix drive. Probably a bit more of a \*modification\* than you thought, but it works...
> 
> It works, right?

Sorry, about that. Vincent, reengage the inertial dampeners (man i missed how that felt), prepare to make the jump!

Alright then. I'll have to make a manual activation since this is the first run. Now why don't you hang onto something? 

**Attempts to start it up**

...Okay this is weird. Why is this not working? Vincent! Can you give me some analysis?

Scanning..................

Insufficient power.

Oh, I totally forgot! This thing is kind of a power hog... What do you use for power on this vessel?

Hmmm, Vincent, bring up Electrical Panel 5...

Ok, if we shut off the shield, and inertial Dampener redundancies, we MIGHT be within operational limits... What is the general power useage of the drive for it to reach full power? Most of our power comes from the main Thermal Plasma Core. For most of our flight parameters, particularly the use of the Relay network we have set up throughout the galaxy.

Umm... Well it's a lot.

Leave everything on; I'm gonna try to rig up a small 011 reactor here. Should be more than enough...

Okay, let's put that there, this here, solder this together... 

**6 minutes later**

Well... Here it is. Don't touch this stuff, kids.

Let's try a direct uplink...

**Suddenly the whole ship jumps to speed**

Whoa okay! Shut it down! 

**Shuts down the drive**
\*Radar station beeps\* um...how much of that power is able to be radiated?
None. It's completely self cycling.
well, something seems to have detected us, and this ship was not exactly designed with the same luxuries as the Saren-class stealth frigates. Enemy inbound...fast!

Oh oh. Vincent, open the shuttle doors! I think it's time we put those new maneuvering pressers to good use. I'll be relaying information about their characteristics!

**Gets in seat**

Power on, armaments ready... I'd say we're in business!

Vincent, do what you can to avoid taking as many hits as possible! Xannari, stay here, I'm going to the gun targeting center. if you can feed me weak points in their hull, I can target them. At this point, we have to work as a team to get out of this. \*before leaving seat\* Raising shields!

- - - Updated - - -

Ok, just reached the targeting center, start feeding me that information to my targeting VISOR I have it set up so you will see exactly what I see.

I can't stay there; Vincent can't manage both combat and analysis at the same time. I'll be getting data from a closer range this way.

You stay back while I engage. My shielding and hull armour is stronger, and I'm a smaller target. They can't catch the likes of me!

**Deploys pulser drive** [made for high maneuverability in combat situations]

[Tauntingly at the Krynn ship] Come on you space weirdos! Catch me if you can!
Alright, just get me some weakpoints! I'd rather spend as little time fighting it as possible. Ok, main guns are aimed for a full broadside...Firing!

Great maneuvering, Vincent! You may get yourself a few upgrades when this is done. Okay, let's see ab-

**Gunfire barely misses the shuttle**

Jeez!! Watch where you're pointing that thing! Good god...

Oh... Umm... Sampa...? They're turning towards you...

I see 'em.. \*enemy fires\* \*grunts\*

Xannari, those shots I fired...damage report on them, I saw they all hit, but their return fire cracked my viewing glass...I can't see clearly... \*chuckles\* Well, let's go WWII. Xannari, I need you to act as an observation craft. I can't see the ship and fire normally. Guide my shots. YOU are my eyes now!

Getting a report now...

...

...

...

...

They did nothing!?
Bloody...They need more power...what if we connected the guns directly to the 011 generator, could that increase the gun power?

You can try it. I've still got 8% left on the full vessel scan. But warning! Don't extract the raw energy from it; it's too unstable. Use the ambient energy instead.

...This wont do. Vincent, fire unit 1 armed with a high yield warhead! Let's see if we can draw their fire...

Ok, preparing to fire a barrage of torpedoes...going to be broadside for five seconds!

5

4

3

2

And torpedoes away!

Vincent, cancel that command!

Don't waste your fire until we know what we're up against. 3.7% left.
Looks like a direct hit...wait...that's the first time I've seen that guy actually stop maneuvering!

Scan complete! Let's see...

...I... I don't... How can... There are NO weak points!?
